com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.entity

Class CommonEntityController<T extends CommonEntity<? extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.entity.CommonEntityController<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tickable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityController, EntityNetworkController

    public class CommonEntityController<T extends CommonEntity<? extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tickable
    A base class for various kinds of Entity Controllers

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommonEntityController

        public CommonEntityController()

    • Method Detail

      • getEntity

        public T getEntity()
        Gets the Common Entity this controller is attached to. If this controller is not yet attached to something, NULL is returned.
        Returns:
        the Common Entity

      • onAttached

        public void onAttached()
        Called as soon as this Controller is attached to an Entity. The entity is already fully attached and spawned prior to this method. This method is the first time you can access the Entity from this Controller.

      • onDetached

        public void onDetached()
        Called as soon as this Controller is detached from an Entity. When this method ends, the entity is fully detached. This method is the last time you can access the Entity from this Controller

      • onTick

        public void onTick()
        Description copied from interface: Tickable
        Updates the object state as part of a single tick (1/20th second)
        Specified by:
        onTick in interface Tickable
